page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: {SOUTH KILWORTH}School has approximately 40 pupils aged 5_11. The school was built in 1851. The school starts with assembly where we sing to songs listen to a story then we have a prayer. In the morning we do Maths and English. In Maths we have calculators and a computer to help us. In English we write stories and poems. We have books to write from. We also do P.E, Games, Art, Music, Science, History and Geography. We went to the area sports we came second out of a lot of schools. We also went to the area swimming gala and we have football and netball matches. We entered two teams in the Leicestershire Schools Technology Challenge.We had to make and design a piece of scientific apparatus.Our team won.
